content.question: The work shown is the Sarcophagus of Junius Bassus. Which architectural and figural elements tie the work to the classical past?

frqParts.text: The work shown is the Sarcophagus of Junius Bassus. Which architectural and figural elements tie the work to the classical past?

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
